prompt: Design a dark-themed time tracker page with a modern, elegant aesthetic. Feature a prominent digital timer at the top displaying hours, minutes, and seconds in a sleek, monospaced font with a neon blue glow effect. Place a rectangular start/pause toggle button below, using green for start and orange for pause, with a smooth hover animation. Add a task input field with a 'Task description' placeholder, styled with sharp edges and a dark background. Include an active session card with task name, elapsed time, and a stop button on the left side. At the bottom, provide a scrollable list of recent time entries with task name, duration, and date, styled with a dark gray background and subtle neon accents. Use a dark background with neon blue and green accents, ensuring a cohesive Material Design 3 look with tight spacing.
